## Deleting nested components

To delete a component that is part of a page:

1. In 'Properties mode', navigate to the page containing the component you want to delete
2. Click ‘Components’
3. On the next screen, click ‘Remove’ against that component
4. Click ‘Update components’

## Deleting pages that are steps

The process is similar to deleting nested components:

1. In 'Properties mode', navigate to the page you want to delete
2. Click ‘Steps’
3. On the next screen, click ‘Remove’ against that page
4. Click ‘Update steps’

## Deleting standalone components and pages

1. In 'Properties mode', navigate to the page you want to delete
2. Click the red ‘Delete instance’ button at the bottom of the screen
heading: Deleting components and pages
